title: Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Pineapple Poppy Seed Vinaigrette
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Pineapple Poppy Seed Vinaigrette a try. This gluten free and vegetarian recipe serves 12 and costs $2.97 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 10g of protein, 8g of fat, and a total of 178 calories. If you have so outstanding tasty and unexpected, twinkles. sparkles. smiles. doves flying over head… you get the idea, my salad was the first of three glorious courses. my inspiration: andy's big, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. Plenty of people made this recipe, and 223 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 86%. This score is excellent. Try Raw Brussels Sprout Salad With Poppy Seed Dressing, Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Raisins & Maple Dijon Vinaigrette, and Shaved Kale & Brussels Sprout Salad with Apple, Sharp Cheddar, Pecans & White Balsamic Vinaigrette for similar recipes.
